content: Revert LocalPassthrough changes in tool_definitions.rs for all log handlers
Build and fix any compile errors after reverting LocalPassthrough
Define raw data structures for handler results (TracingLevelResult, LogPathResult, LogContentResult, LogListResult, CleanupResult)
Build and fix any compile errors after defining data structures
Add ExtractorType::DataField variant for extracting fields from raw data
Update convert_extractor_type to handle DataField extractor
Build and fix any compile errors after adding extractors
Run cargo clippy after extractor implementation
Fix any clippy issues
Update set_tracing_level handler to return TracingLevelResult
Build and fix any compile errors after updating set_tracing_level
Update get_trace_log_path handler to return LogPathResult
Build and fix any compile errors after updating get_trace_log_path
Update read_log handler to return LogContentResult
Build and fix any compile errors after updating read_log
Update list_logs handler to return LogListResult
Build and fix any compile errors after updating list_logs
Update cleanup_logs handler to return CleanupResult
Build and fix any compile errors after updating cleanup_logs
Run cargo clippy after handler updates
Fix any clippy issues after handler updates
Update tool_generator to handle new data structures in format_handler_result
Build and fix any compile errors after updating tool_generator
Update set_tracing_level tool definition with proper template and DataField extractors
Update get_trace_log_path tool definition with proper template and DataField extractors
Update read_log tool definition with proper template and DataField extractors
Update list_logs tool definition with proper template and DataField extractors
Update cleanup_logs tool definition with proper template and DataField extractors
Build and fix any compile errors after updating tool definitions
Run cargo clippy after all changes
Fix any final clippy issues
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
Review test results and stop if there are issues
Task subagent for code review focused on duplication, complexity, and plan validation
Review code review feedback with user
